pkgmetadata.longdescription: Enrichment Analysis of CRISPR/Cas9 Knockout Screen Data // Provides functions to implement sgRSEA (single-guide RNA Set Enrichment Analysis), which is a robust test for identification of essential genes from genetic screening data using CRISPR (clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeats) and Cas9 (CRISPR-associated nuclease 9) system.
